=== Edubuntu Summit, July 1-3, London, UK ===

The <nowiki>[[Edubuntu-WikiSite-Gatherings-200507EdubuntuSummit|Edubuntu Summit]]</nowiki> took place 2005, July 1-3, London, UK.

Please add your picture gallery below if you took photos at the summit.

==== Galleries ====

Some snaps from the summit, including the delegates/speakers from Skolelinux, Edubuntu/Ubuntu, Lliurex, Guadalinex, tuXlabs and K12LTSP.
